dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. "Cum priuilegio." German text on verso with caption title: Das Königreich Persen, oder die Herrshafft des Sophi; p. 85. From: Theatrum, oder, Schawbuch des Erdtkreys ... In Antorff [Antwerp] : Bey Christoffel Plantin, in Verlegung Abraham Örtell, 1580. Historic Maps copy 2 is uncolored.
